title: Bank Clearings, Daily Average for United States
notes:
NBER Derived Data By Dividing Monthly Totals By Calendar Days. Source: Data Were Derived By NBER, Data For 1875-1883 Are From "The Public"; Data For 1884-1943 Were Furnished By The Commercial And Financial Chronicle.

This NBER data series m12013 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 12 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter12.html.

NBER Indicator: m12013
